name: simple-ioc
description: Simple Inversion of Control for node.js

scripts.test: npm -s run test-unit && npm -s run test-function
scripts.test-unit: echo ' --- Unit tests --- ' && node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --reporter spec --colors --recursive tests/unit
scripts.test-function: echo ' --- Function tests --- ' && node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --reporter spec --colors --recursive tests/function

author: Joakim J. Rapp, Viaplay
